name: MadOut2 BigCityOnline
description: Open world game, with free roam game play, many cars, missions and - online mode!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 Core Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600, Intel HD 3000 Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 4 Core Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970 or equivalent Storage: 1000 MB available space
